sentences.en: A policeman and then a paramedic tried to resuscitate her.
sentences.cn: 一名警察，接着是一名医护人员试图把她救醒。

sentences.en: He had a heart attack and all attempts to resuscitate him failed.
sentences.cn: 他的心脏病发作，所有抢救他的努力都失败了。

sentences.en: He has submitted a bid to resuscitate the weekly magazine, which closed in April with losses of $1 million a year.
sentences.cn: 他已经竞标以使由于100万美元1年的损失于4月份停刊了的那个周刊起死回生。
